think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob in question: max_locks_per_transaction. 2. In the case of max_locks_per_transaction, setting it to a very high value or a specific value like -1 or 0 does not disable the feature or perform a significantly different function; it simply adjusts the limit. 4. Conclude that max_locks_per_transaction does not have special values that break its natural order for a different function.
